titleInfo.title: Lelley's Snappy Steppers file record sheet no 8

mods.abstract: Hatch record for Lelley's Snappy Steppers from August 1928. Lists folio number, dates, items, itemized debits, total debits, and credits. Hatch printed posters for Lelley's Snappy Steppers only in 1928.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
recordInfo.recordOrigin: Record has been transformed into MODS v3.5 from a Qualified Dublin Core record by the Digital Library of Tennessee, a service hub of the Digital Public Library of America.
